And I think it was a combination, perhaps, of the unexpected and the familiar that really prompted her to open her eyes and look around, said her doctor, Dr. Michael Lemole. But it was Gabrielle Giffords ' husband's reaction to this milestone that made Kirsten Gillibrand realize this was the very first time Gabrielle Giffords had opened her eyes since being shot.

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out.
